mapper.select: select mem_id,mem_name, mem_birth, mem_email from (select members.mem_id,members.mem_name,members.mem_birth,members.mem_email from members where mem_id!= #{mem_id} and mem_id not in (select fri_id as fri_id from friend where mem_id=#{mem_id}) ) where mem_id like '%'||#{value}||'%' or mem_name like '%'||#{value}||'%'
mapper.delete: delete from friend where mem_id=#{mem_id} and fri_id=#{fri_id}
